The rune hasta is a one handed melee members weapon, similar to the spear. 40 Attack and Barbarian Training in Smithing are required to wield this weapon. Although hastae offer negative defensive bonuses, the fact that they can be used with a shield provides more defence than a normal spear. It can be poisoned.

To obtain a rune hasta, the player can either create one using the Smithing skill with 90 Smithing, 1 runite bar and a magic log, trade with another player, or by killing brutal red dragons or brutal black dragons.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 July 2021
(update)

The position of the weapon and its variants on female players has been adjusted so that they appear to be equipped properly.

21 April 2021
(update)

The hasta's attack speed has been decreased from 5 (every 3.0 seconds) to 4 (every 2.4 seconds).

The '''rune hasta''' is a one handed [[melee]] [[members]] [[weapon]], similar to the [[spear]]. 40 [[Attack]] and [[Barbarian Training]] in [[Smithing]] are required to wield this weapon. Although hastae offer negative defensive bonuses, the fact that they can be used with a [[shield]] provides more defence than a normal spear. It can be [[poison]]ed.

To obtain a rune hasta, the player can either create one using the [[Smithing]] skill with 90 Smithing, 1 [[runite bar]] and a [[Magic logs|magic log]], trade with another player, or by killing [[brutal red dragon]]s or [[brutal black dragon]]s.
